programme.title: Colors
programme.desc: Two cops, one newly assigned and one is an old stager, are on the edge of losing control over their street authority in East Los Angeles when they get into an altercation due to the colors the gang members are wearing instead of presenting a unified front to the gang.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a CIA agent is killed in a mission gone south, the agency recruits his previously-unknown identical twin brother, a street hustler, to take his place. A veteran agent is entrusted with his training and with convincing him to take on the dangerous mission.

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: A drone repairman (Tom Cruise) is sent back to an evacuated Earth where a human-alien war sixty years ago wiped out half the planet. He makes a shocking discovery that causes him to question everything he knows about his world, his mission and himself.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Today, Kaulder is the last witch hunter remaining, and has spent centuries hunting down rogue witches, all the while yearning for his long-lost loved ones. However, unbeknownst to Kaulder, the Queen Witch is resurrected and seeks revenge on her killer causing an epic battle that will determine the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: When the lives of his wife and child are put in danger by a bloodthirsty sultan, prince Vlad risks his soul to save them.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The beautiful Snow White gets into a fierce conflict with the Evil Queen. The Huntsman tries to train her to withstand these evil forces, but is it enough for her to defeat them.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. Seeking the origins of humanity, the crew arrives on a distant world and discovers a threat that could cause the extinction of the human race.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: This title is a science fiction action film that was directed by Nimrod Antal. The movie stars Adrian Brody and Laurence Fishburne among others and it is the third film in the “Predator” franchise. Royce (Adrian Brody) is a mercenary who regains consciousness to find himself parachuting into an unknown jungle. Once on the ground he links up with others who seem to have arrived there by the same means. Everyone in the group, with the notable exception of a doctor, seem to come from dark backgrounds. There is a drug cartel enforcer, a Sptsnaz soldier, a death row inmate and a Yakuza man to name only a few – not to mention Royce, who is himself a mercenary as mentioned earlier. As the film progresses, the group learn that they are in fact on an alien planet. That’s not the worst part though – they also learn that they are being hunted by an alien race known as the “Predators”.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: Eva Lord (Eva Green) asks her ex-boyfriend Dwight (Josh Brolin) to help her escape her violent rich husband Damien Lord. But Dwight soon discovers that Eva's intention is full of evil and hatred. On the other hand, John Harrington (Bruce Willis) meets Nancy (Jessica Alba) and events escalate.

programme.desc: Five years after the first part, the wanted criminal (Riddick) arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself facing the invasion of an empire called Necromongers, the army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.(n)

programme.desc: John Rambo returns after many years to finish his final mission, seeking revenge on everyone who betrayed him, and a journey of dangers begins in the final chapter of Rambo's adventures.(n)

programme.desc: As he accompanies his kids to a basketball match, Jesse, the security guard who was once a special forces officer, is in a predicament when he finds out about a group of technophile extremists who are holding a coach and his daughter captive inside the arena.(n)

programme.desc: An adaptation of the Japanese animated high-tech film, a special ops human-cyborg hybrid called The Major leads Section 9, which is an elite task force team. Devoted to stopping the most dangerous criminals and extremists, Section 9 is faced with an enemy whose singular goal is to wipe out Hanka Robotic's advancements in cyber technology.(n)

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: An overworked paramedic begins to hallucinate over a three-night shift. As he is haunted by the ghosts of those he failed to save, he must fight to hold onto his sanity.(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: In an apocalyptic world, prisoner Jensen Ames is forced to participate in a car race that is unlike any other. It's a race between armored cars on Terminal Island. In order to win the race, you must brutalize and murder all other competitors. But what if it's merely a trap.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
programme.desc: As he attempts to rescue Princess Leia from Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker teams up with Han Solo and two droids to find the princess and destroy a powerful weapon made by the Galactic Empire.(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to stop Memnon from taking over the world, the leaders of the remaining free tribes hire the assassin Mathayus to kill Cassandra, whom Menmon depends on to foretell his great victoies.(n)

programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.(n)

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.(n)

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: A DEA agent (Denzel Washington) and a naval intelligence officer (Mark Wahlberg) find themselves on the run after a botched attempt to infiltrate a drug cartel. While fleeing, they learn the secret of their shaky alliance: Neither knew that the other was an undercover agent.(n)

programme.title: Sicario
programme.desc: In the border stretching between Mexico and the U.S.A, an area that has been always out of the reach of law, an idealistic FBI agent is assigned to aid in the escalating war against the cartel.(n)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.(n)

programme.desc: In an attempt to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted, a group of college graduates goes on a destructive spree as they rob Chicago's richest while sending a message to the world.(n)

programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.(n)

programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.

programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.

programme.desc: The documentary revolves around the iconic boxing champion Muhammad Ali, as it depicts his rise from a poor boy to being a worldwide legend and becoming an influential social activist in his community after retirement.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: The extraordinary story of Steve Jobs: from college dropout to Apple founder, entrepreneur, and creator of one of the most widespread devices of the 21st century, the iPhone.

programme.desc: Journalist Andie Anderson specializes in writing topics of interest to women, but she wants to write about other things. She makes a deal with her boss that she would be free to write what she wants if she can write an article about what girls do wrong to spoil their relationship with guys.

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: The friendship and faith of a priest and a rabbi are tested when they both fall for an old friend. As both men struggle between upholding their duties and following their hearts.

programme.desc: An innocent highway tollbooth worker is convicted of a bank heist, and decides to take the fall for a crime he did not do. While in jail, his formerly pathless life is altered when he meets his cellmate Max, a con man with whom he plans to rob a bank upon his release.

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Ryan Bingham is a man with a very odd job. He travels to offices across the United States in order to execute layoffs. His job has him travelling most of the time and he has found a comfortable life for himself. However, Natalie Keener, a rapidly-rising young co-worker at Ryan’s head office, threatens to throw his world off balance by proposing that firing should be done through the internet.

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: In 1964, racism continues to cast a shadow over America. Three civil rights defenders disappear in Mississippi. Two FBI agents go to the town to look into this mysterious case. Robert Anderson, worked in the region before joining the FBI, is well aware of the nature of the place, so he does not mind bending rules to achieve his goal. Events escalate and attacks on black citizens begin.

Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.(n)

programme.desc: During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossible mission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.(n)

programme.title: Wander Darkly
programme.desc: After going through a traumatic accident, the couple Adrienne and Matteo find themselves experiencing a surreal state of being, where they have to confront their past before dealing with their uncertain future.(n)

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: When his son gets kidnapped by a mysterious entity, former special forces agent Niro finds himself embroiled in a dangerous situation, as he must take out three dangerous crime syndicates in order to get his son back.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.(n)

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.(n)

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: After walking away from her former life to take over her grandmother's wedding photography business, the past comes calling for Maggie when she is hired for the wedding of her ex-boyfriend's sister. It turns out that there is still a spark between the two, just waiting to be reignited.(n)

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mask
programme.desc: When the English traveler Jonathan Green receives an order to map the Russian Far East from Peter the Great, he goes yet on another adventure full of ups and downs that will eventually lead him to China, where he will face many unexpected encounters.(n)

During World War I, two British soldiers go on an impossible mission, where they must enter the enemy territory, to deliver a message to prevent their beleaguered troops from marching towards a deadly trap.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: Sitting in Limbo
programme.desc: After he is wretched living in the UK for 50 years, the Jamaican-born man, Anthony Bryan, struggles during the Windrush scandal to be accepted as a British Citizen, as well as falling victim to the UK Home Office, at which he is considered an illegal immigrant and is threatened of deportation.(n)

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A daring synthetic biologist, having lost his family in a car accident, will stop at nothing to bring them back, even if it means going up against a government-controlled laboratory and the physical laws of science.(n)

programme.title: Jungleland
programme.desc: A boxer travels with his brother, who is managing him, for a final boxing match. But when an unexpected travel companion joins them, truths and cracks in the two brothers' relationship come to the surface.(n)

programme.title: Galveston
programme.desc: As he barely escapes a fatal set up by his mobster boss, hitman Ryan finds himself accompanied by Rocky, a young prostitute that he saves, as he tries to find his way back to his hometown to recuperate and plan his revenge.(n)

programme.title: Love Song
programme.desc: After both Duke Sterling and Grady Connor agree on musical collaboration, a dispute arises between them over songwriting, which makes Connor's manager persuade him to write one song for Duke to participate in a music festival, and there Connor gets to meet the country singer Shayna.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.(n)

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.(n)

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.(n)

programme.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
programme.desc: When a fire breaks out in the prison for the mentally ill, Dr. Albert Beck runs away and takes a shelter in an abandoned house, after which he's surprised to find that his hideout is the new house of a woman and her 18-year-old daughter.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.(n)

programme.title: Jane Fonda in Five Acts
programme.desc: A documentary about the American actress, activist, environmentalist, fashion model and fitness coach Jane Fonda, through diving deep into her personal life, her relationship with her father Henry Fonda and the great efforts she made to become who she is.(n)

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.(n)

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: After the events of Star Wars: The Force Awakens, the heroes continue their grand adventure, which reveals to them many of the mysteries of the past with regard to power.(n)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassin's guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.(n)

programme.title: Embattled
programme.desc: A young man seeks to become an MMA fighter like his estranged father, all the while struggling not to get carried away with violence like him.(n)

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.(n)

programme.desc: George and Kathy move with their children to a new house in the quiet town of Amityville. They learn about a murder that happened in the house a year ago, but decide to ignore it. Suddenly, George is acting strange and Chelsea starts seeing mysterious figures around the house. Before long, their lives turn into a living hell.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Beneath the Leaves
programme.desc: After going to jail for kidnapping four boys, the deranged psychopath James Whitley escapes from prison to resume his evil path. Two detectives set out to stop him before he destroys anymore lives.

programme.title: Little Man Tate
programme.desc: Fred is a genius in math and reading, but he can't adjust with other children in school, he's slowly isolated from them and finds it difficult to socialize next to those of his age, he gets help from his teacher and his single mom.

programme.title: The Stalker Club
programme.desc: When a group of teens joins the stalker club, their safety is threatened as a teenage girl becomes the target of a masked stalker when she participates in a dangerous game.

programme.desc: When her eldest son is killed, the widowed Ann is determined to solve his murder and find out the killer. When the detective assigned to the case does not offer her sufficient answers, she decides to take the investigation into her own hands.

programme.title: Hunter's Prayer
programme.desc: Sam, an assassin who is appointed to kill a woman, fails to pull the trigger to kill her. He then eventually has to cooperate with her to escape the ones who had killed her family and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, he's the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: Wade Wilson, AKA Deadpool, has a new mission to protect a little boy with extraordinary powers, who’s being chased by the time traveling cyborg assassin Kaleb – he forms his very own team of Superheroes to assist him.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: Det. John McClane finds himself in the fight of his life when he goes to visit his wife in her office building, only for German terrorists to take over the building and threaten everyone's lives.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick (Keanu Reeves) a former professional assassin,whose peaceful life is disturbed when a thief breaks into his house, steals his car, and kills his dog. He seeks revenge on this thief, and discovers that his father is a Russian gang leader, who sets a reward for those who kill John.

programme.title: Possum
programme.desc: Phillip, a puppeteer, has a troubled past and a fixation on a creepy puppet that he works with. When he is forced to confront his past and his evil step-father after he returns to his childhood home, he soon comes to discover that confronting the demons of his past can have dire consequences.

programme.title: Pyewacket
programme.desc: A thriller about a frustrated daughter who chooses to perform a supernatural ritual to get rid of her mother because of their strained relationship together. But her ritual evokes an evil presence that unleashes its occult destruction.

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Dale Denton is a stoner who particularly enjoys a strain of marijuana called Pineapple Express, urging him to frequent his dealer Saul Silver. Dale accidentally drops his roach in a crime scene, which endangers the lives of the two men as it gets traced back to them.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In the future, old age stops at 25 and everyone must provide more time for themselves for a longer life. Time replaces money, which makes the rich trade it and possess many centuries that almost guarantee their immortality,while the poor has only a few minutes after reaching the age of 25.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The US marines face off against alien creatures who are attempting an invasion of the city of LA.

programme.desc: The crimes of Ted Bundy told from the perspective of his longtime girlfriend, Elizabeth Kloepfer, who refused to believe the truth about him for years.

programme.desc: Paranormal enthusiast Abby Yates and physicist Erin Gilbert form an unlikely paranormal investigating team with engineer Jillian Holtzmann and subway worker Patty Tolan. As ghouls descend on Times Square, the four women uncover a plot to cause an apocalypse by summoning ghosts to New York City.(n)

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: This thriller recounts how the U.S. container ship, the Maersk Alabama, headed by Captain Richard Phillips (Tom Hanks), became the first American ship to be hijacked in two hundred years when they come head to head with Somali pirates.(n)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.title: Can You Keep a Secret?
programme.desc: Fearing a plane crash, the drunk Emma confesses her deepest secrets to the man sitting next to her who turns out to be her company's CEO. As love blossoms between them, Emma struggles with their uneven relationship born out of him knowing everything about her, and her knowing nothing about him.

programme.title: Tolkien
programme.desc: The film deals with the period of childhood and youth of the great writer J.R.R. Tolkien, the author of The Hobbit and Lord of the Rings, the love story that shaped his life, and the experience of World War I in which he participated in.

programme.title: Broken Vows
programme.desc: When he is rejected by the woman he initially seduced during a bachelorette party, the charm of a young man turns into terror as he spirals into a fit of anger and his troubled side manifests.

programme.desc: A divorced couple, Richard and Kate, puts their differences aside and plots to recover their stolen retirement money from the company owner.
